events.message:
tests: Print remaining jobs in test_runner.py

This helps finding out which tests fail to finish.

issue.title: [Travis] Show functional tests progress
issue.body:
Backport of https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/14504, https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/14569 and https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/15466.
This should help to see which test takes too long or blocks travis when it hangs because of the 50 minutes limit.

comments.diff_hunk:
@@ -477,6 +477,11 @@ def get_next(self):
                               log_stderr))
         if not self.jobs:
             raise IndexError('pop from empty list')
+
+        # Print remaining jobs when the backlog is empty.
+        if not self.test_list:
+            print('Remaining jobs: [' + ", ".join(j[0] for j in self.jobs) + ']')
comments.body:
nit:
```py
print('Remaining jobs: [{}]'.format(', '.join(j[0] for j in self.jobs))
```
